text: Kei'n kalei-en phakhan, ajia kasuomak sakor inkhat aleiom. Sakor kaseppa raming kha Kathi inti, halli Kathikhuo6:8: Kathikhuo Kathi ngai omna ram (1:18 khan enru). in ama nukkha aheijui. Inmani ngaidiang khan nuoipilchung semmili ah semkhat chungnga, chemma, bu kawaang li rirai minsuoknasik halli ramsa ngai inliingnali mi ngai thatnasik ranak kha inleipeii. Ezek 14:21
